document_data.name: ''Out of the Endless Prison''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Out of the Endless Prison''''' was a [[book]] that discussed methods for escaping [[Carceri]], the so-called "prison-[[plane]]".
document_data.History: The book was written long before the 15{{th}} century [[DR]], and was highly valued by [[scholar]]s who studied the planes.
document_data.Notable Owners: *The [[Dolindar]] family, who were known for their study of the planes. Their copy of ''Out of the Endless Prison'' came to rest within the vault of their [[Dolindar Tomb|family tomb]].
